methods.description: Get a list of all the hotels of a chain your application has access to.

parameters.description: Application identifier

parameters.name: appId
parameters.description: Application identifier

methods.description: Get a list of codes for the specified hotel either filtered by type or code.

parameters.name: appId
parameters.description: Application identifier

parameters.name: appKey
parameters.description: Application key.

parameters.name: hotelId
parameters.description: The hotel id you are trying to find codes for.

parameters.name: code
parameters.description:
Return all results matching the specified code. A code is unique in combination with the type
            which means when you query for a code you could get multiple results each for a different type

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Return all codes for the specified type

methods.description: Get all the details for a specific code available for the hotel.

parameters.name: appId
parameters.description: Application identifier

parameters.name: appKey
parameters.description: Application key.

parameters.name: hotelId
parameters.description: The hotel id the code available for.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The code identifier you want to see details for.

methods.description: Get a list of rateplans for the specified hotel id matching the filter criteria.

parameters.name: appId
parameters.description: Application identifier

parameters.name: appKey
parameters.description: Application key.

parameters.name: hotelId
parameters.description: The hotel id you are trying to find rateplans for.

parameters.name: sellingStatus
parameters.description:
Specify which rateplans to return. If you do not specify a value you will by default get active
            rateplans.

parameters.name: commissionable
parameters.description: Return all rateplans having commisionable status

parameters.name: group
parameters.description: Return all rateplans belonging to the specified rateplan group

parameters.name: baseRateplan
parameters.description: Return all rateplans having the specified rateplan as base rateplan

parameters.name: channelGroup
parameters.description: Return all rateplans that are sold through at least one channel out of the specified channel group

parameters.name: channelCode
parameters.description: Return all rateplans sold through the specified channel

parameters.name: marketCodes
parameters.description: Return all rateplans having one of the specified values as a market code

parameters.name: roomTypes
parameters.description: Return all rateplans by which at least one of the specified room types are sold

parameters.name: includedServices
parameters.description: Return all rateplans having at least one of the specified services included

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: Amount of items to skip.

parameters.name: top
parameters.description: Amount of items to select.

parameters.name: inlinecount
parameters.description: Return total number of items for a given filter criteria.

methods.description: Get the count of all rateplans in the hotel matching the given filter criteria.

parameters.description: Application identifier

parameters.name: appKey
parameters.description: Application key.

parameters.name: hotelId

parameters.name: sellingStatus
parameters.description:
Specify which rateplans to return. If you do not specify a value you will by default get active
            rateplans.

parameters.name: commissionable
parameters.description: Return all rateplans having commisionable status

parameters.name: group
parameters.description: Return all rateplans belonging to the specified rateplan group

parameters.name: baseRateplan
parameters.description: Return all rateplans having the specified rateplan as base rateplan

parameters.name: channelGroup
parameters.description: Return all rateplans that are sold through at least one channel out of the specified channel group

parameters.name: channelCode
parameters.description: Return all rateplans sold through the specified channel

parameters.name: marketCodes
parameters.description: Return all rateplans having one of the specified values as a market code

parameters.name: roomTypes
parameters.description: Return all rateplans by which at least one of the specified room types are sold

parameters.name: includedServices
parameters.description: Return all rateplans having at least one of the specified services included

methods.description: Get the setup of the daily rates for a specific rateplan and a defined timeperiod.

parameters.name: appId
parameters.description: Application identifier

parameters.name: appKey
parameters.description: Application key.

parameters.name: hotelId
parameters.description: The hotel id the rateplan belongs to.

parameters.name: rateplanCode
parameters.description: The code of the rateplan you want to see details for.

parameters.name: expand
parameters.description: You can expand the supplements per room type on demand. By default they are not shown.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Defines the last business day you would like to get rates for. The maximum time span between from´and to is limited to 365 days.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Defines the first business day you would like to get rates for.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: Amount of items to skip.

parameters.name: top
parameters.description: Amount of items to select.

parameters.name: inlinecount
parameters.description: Return total number of items for a given filter criteria.

methods.description: Get a list of rooms using the provided filtering and pagination criteria.

parameters.name: appId
parameters.description: Application identifier

parameters.name: appKey
parameters.description: Application key.

parameters.name: hotelId
parameters.description: The hotel you are trying to find rooms for.

parameters.name: occupancy
parameters.description: Return results only for rooms that have the given frontdesk ocuppancy status.

parameters.name: conditions
parameters.description: Return results only for rooms that have the given room condition status.

parameters.name: maintenances
parameters.description: Return results only for rooms that have the given maintenance status.

parameters.name: roomTypes
parameters.description: Return result only for rooms for the given room types. Allows to pass a comma-separated list of room types.

parameters.name: amenities
parameters.description:
Return result only for rooms having all of the given amenities. You can provide a comma seperated list of 
            amenity codes.

parameters.name: views
parameters.description:
Return result only for rooms having at least one of the specified views. You can provide a comma seperated list of 
            view codes.

parameters.name: locations
parameters.description:
Return result only for rooms having at least one of the specified locations. You can provide a comma seperated list of 
            location codes.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: Amount of items to skip.

parameters.name: top
parameters.description: Amount of items to select.

parameters.name: inlinecount
parameters.description: Return total number of items for a given filter criteria.

parameters.name: occupancy
parameters.description: Return results only for rooms that have the given frontdesk ocuppancy status.

parameters.name: conditions

parameters.name: maintenances
parameters.description: Return results only for rooms that have the given maintenance status.

parameters.name: roomTypes
parameters.description: Return result only for rooms for the given room types. Allows to pass a comma-separated list of room types.

parameters.name: amenities
parameters.description:
Return result only for rooms having all of the given amenities. You can provide a comma seperated list of

parameters.name: views

methods.description: Request available rooms using a given criteria.

parameters.name: appId
parameters.description: Application identifier

parameters.name: appKey
parameters.description: Application key.

parameters.name: hotelId
parameters.description: The hotel you are looking for available rooms.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description:
Rooms returned will not be assigned to a reservation or be under maintenance between this date
            and the specified to date. Still there could be departing reservations or ending maintenances
            for this date.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description:
Rooms returned will not be assigned to a reservation or be under maintenance between the specified
            from date and this date. Still there could be arriving reservations or beginning maintenances
            for this date.

parameters.name: adults
parameters.description: Specifies number of adults the returned rooms will have to be able to house. The default value is 1.

parameters.name: includeOutOfService
parameters.description:
Should rooms that are set OutOfService in the defined time period be returned as available. By default
            they are not.

parameters.name: roomTypes
parameters.description: Return result only for rooms for the given room types. Allows to pass a comma-separated list of room types.

parameters.name: amenities
parameters.description:
Return result only for rooms having all of the given amenities. You can provide a comma seperated list of 
            amenity codes.

parameters.name: views
parameters.description:
Return result only for rooms having at least one of the specified views. You can provide a comma seperated list of 
            view codes.

parameters.name: locations
parameters.description:
Return result only for rooms having at least one of the specified locations. You can provide a comma seperated list of 
            location codes.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: Amount of items to skip.

parameters.name: top
parameters.description: Amount of items to select.

parameters.name: inlinecount
parameters.description: Return total number of items for a given filter criteria.

methods.description: Saves Yieldable Rate Prices for existing Yieldable Rateplan.

parameters.name: appId

parameters.name: appKey
parameters.description: Application key.
